author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Median Technologies FY Revenues Increased By 21% To 7.69 Million Euros
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - MEDIAN TECHNOLOGIES SA:
* ‍FULL YEAR 2017 REVENUES INCREASED BY 21% TO EUR 7.69 MILLION FROM EUR 6.35 MILLION IN 2016​
* ‍NET NEW BUSINESS OF EUR 14.69 MILLION IN 2017, INCREASED BACKLOG TO EUR 23 MILLION AS OF DEC 31, 2017​
* ‍CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY EUR 28.29 MILLION AS OF DEC 31, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
